item.title: MacMinute update
item.description: As we posted earlier, MacMinute cannot continue. That said, we've got a couple of paths that we're finalizing how your up to the minute news needs can be served, as well as what will happen to the forums...

item.title: Clarification from Julie
item.description: I would like to make a clarification as, evidently, I was not crystal clear with my previous post...

item.title: Upcoming Changes For MacMinute
item.description: Upon careful consideration and with deep sadness, I regret to inform Stans MacMinute readers that we are unable to continue operating the MacMinute website at this time...

item.title: MacMinute update from the Flack family
item.description: On behalf of the Flack family, I would like to express our sincere appreciation for all the kind words of sympathy extended to our family, as we mourn the loss of our beloved Stan...

item.title: Pro Applications Update 2008-01
item.description: Apple has rereleased Pro Applications Update 2008-01 via its Software Update application or on the Web...

item.title: Burger Shop now available
item.description: Burger Shop now available Macgamestore has published Burger Shop...

item.title: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 1.4.1 update posted
item.description: Adobe has posted he Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 1.4.1 update, which includes these enhancements: additional camera support for the Canon EOS 450D (Digital Rebel XSi/EOS Kiss X2), Nikon D60, Sony A350 and more, updated printer driver compatibility for Mac OS X 10.5 (Leopard), and several corrections for issues introduced by the Lightroom 1.4 release...

item.title: MacBook Air Bluetooth Firmware Update 1.0 posted
item.description: Apple as released MacBook Air Bluetooth Firmware Update 1.0 via its Software Update application or on the Web...

item.title: Deals: Toon Boom Storyboard' 32% off today only
item.description: Today's featured promo on MacUpdate offers Toon Boom Storyboard for US$169 (32% off, retail $249.99)...

item.title: Equinux enhances The Tube 2.6 with new EPG engine
item.description: Equinux today released The Tube 2.6 with a completely reengineered EPG engine...

item.title: iPresentee releases new add-ons for Keynote
item.description: iPresentee has releaesd Keynote Motion Themes to be used with Apples Keynote presentation software. iPresentee offers five new Keynote themes: Orbit, Gear, Balloons, Light and Time...

item.title: Deals: Cheetah3D 47% off today only
item.description: Today's featured promo on MacUpdate offers Cheetah3D for US$79 (47% off, retail $149)...

item.title: Creaceed ships Morph Age Regular/Pro 4.0
item.description: Creaceed today is shipping final versions of Morph Age 4.0 and Morph Age Pro 4.0 for morphing/warping images and movies on Mac OS X Leopard...

item.title: New iPhone cases now available from DLO
item.description: Digital Lifestyle Outfitters (DLO) today announced the availability of two new cases in its extensive line of iPhone accessories...

item.title: Stairways Software releases Keyboard Maestro 3.0
item.description: Stairways Software has announced Keyboard Maestro 3.0, the new version of its powerful productivity enhancer for Mac OS X...

item.title: Deals: Sandvox 39% off today only
item.description: Today's featured promo on MacUpdate offers Sandvox for US$29.99 (39% off, retail $49)...

item.title: New Adobe TV Programming comes online
item.description: Adobe Systems today announced Adobe TV, a free online video resource for expert instruction and inspiration about Adobe products, including the companys Creative Suite 3 family of world-class creative tools...

item.title: Apple releases numerous updates
item.description: Apple today posted several up , including: Mac Book Air EFI Firmware Update 1.0 (fixes several issues to improve the stability of MacBook Air computers); Firmware Restoration CD 1.6 (used to restore the firmware of Intel-based Macs); MacBook EFI Firmware Update 1.2 (fixes several issues to improve the stability of MacBook computers); Mac Book Pro EFI Firmware Update 1.5 (fixes several issues to improve the stability of MacBook Pro computers); iMac EFI Firmware Update 1.3 (fixes several issues to improve the stability of iMac computers); and Aluminum Keyboard Update (addresses an issue with the aluminum Apple Keyboard and the aluminum Apple Wireless Keyboard where a key may repeat unexpectedly while typing...

item.title: Deals: NetShade 48% off today only
item.description: Today's featured promo on MacUpdate offers NetShade for US$14.99 (48% off, retail $29)...

item.title: Apple ships Final Cut Server
item.description: Apple today announced that Final Cu Server, a powerful software solution for media asset management and workflow automation, is now shipping...
